title: Lumberjack log driver options schema
description: Create a project-specific Lumberjack log driver.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the logger?

path.description: The path at which to create the service, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new service.

rootFolder.description: This property is used internally to append the logger in folder name genarated.
